resources.string: Turn-By-Turn using NavigationView
Render a complete turn-by-turn experience using NavigationView.
Change styling of UI components at runtime
The example demonstrates how to change the styling of UI components used by navigation view at runtime
Change Navigation View Options at runtime
The example demonstrates how to change navigation view options at runtime
Customize speed limit view using NavigationView
The example demonstrates how to customize speed limit at runtime
Customize trip progress view using NavigationView
The example demonstrates how to customize trip progress view at runtime
Inject a custom view into NavigationView
The example demonstrates how to inject a custom view at the bottom of the info panel
Toggle theme using NavigationView
The example demonstrates how NavigationView observes changes to app day and night theme
Customize info panel using NavigationView
The example demonstrates how to replace default info panel with a custom one
Customize info panel in active guidance state
The example demonstrates how to replace default info panel with a custom one only in active guidance state
Customize info panel attributes using NavigationView
The example demonstrates how to change margins, background and peek height of the default info panel.
Customize action buttons using NavigationView
The example demonstrates how to change the shape of action buttons provided by NavigationView
Request routes using MapboxNavigation
The example demonstrates how to request routes using mapbox navigation and transition NavigationView to active guidance state
Position speed limit to bottom left
The example demonstrates how to change the position of speed limit view to bottom left of the screen
Handle long clicks on the map
The example demonstrates how to handle your own long click on the map view
Hide selected views in Free Drive state
The example demonstrates how to hide Speed Limit, Action buttons and Road name label in Free Drive state
Add action buttons
The example demonstrates how to add custom action buttons to list of action buttons available via NavigationView
